CustomField.formula: text(DAY( Mortgage_Discharge_Date__c )) +' '+CASE( MONTH( Mortgage_Discharge_Date__c ) , 1, "January", 2, "February", 3, "March", 4, "April", 5, "May", 6, "June", 7, "July", 8, "August", 9, "September", 10, "October", 11, "November", "December")+' '+ Text(YEAR( Mortgage_Discharge_Date__c ))
CustomField.label: Mortgage_Discharge_Date_Text
